attributes.action: reimburse customers following the collapse of MFI
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the collapse of MFI, many members of the public are suffering financial loss due to no fault of their own,they have spent money to keep the economy going, the people who are suffering are the ones who were prudent and saved for their purchases rather than rely on credit,the Government has used tax payers money to bail out banks, why won't they help these people who can ill afford to suffer the financial losses.
